org.lightningj.lnd.neutrino.proto

Class NeutrinoKitGrpc.NeutrinoKitFutureStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grpc.stub.AbstractStub<S>
      • io.grpc.stub.AbstractFutureStub<NeutrinoKitGrpc.NeutrinoKitFutureStub>
        • org.lightningj.lnd.neutrino.proto.NeutrinoKitGrpc.NeutrinoKitFutureStub
  • Enclosing class:
    NeutrinoKitGrpc

    public static final class NeutrinoKitGrpc.NeutrinoKitFutureStub
extends io.grpc.stub.AbstractFutureStub<NeutrinoKitGrpc.NeutrinoKitFutureStub>
    A stub to allow clients to do ListenableFuture-style rpc calls to service NeutrinoKit. 
     NeutrinoKit is a service that can be used to get information about the
 current state of the neutrino instance, fetch blocks and add/remove peers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class io.grpc.stub.AbstractStub

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Neutrino.StatusResponse> status(Neutrino.StatusRequest request)
        Status returns the status of the light client neutrino instance,
along with height and hash of the best block, and a list of connected
peers.

      • addPeer

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Neutrino.AddPeerResponse> addPeer(Neutrino.AddPeerRequest request)

      • disconnectPeer

        public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Neutrino.DisconnectPeerResponse> disconnectPeer(Neutrino.DisconnectPeerRequest request)
        DisconnectPeer disconnects a peer by target address. Both outbound and
inbound nodes will be searched for the target node. An error message will
be returned if the peer was not found.

      • isBanned

      • getBlockHash

        @Deprecated
public com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Neutrino.GetBlockHashResponse> getBlockHash(Neutrino.GetBlockHashRequest request)
        Deprecated. 
        Deprecated, use chainrpc.GetBlockHash instead.
GetBlockHash returns the header hash of a block at a given height.
